inputSizeCode:
<input nz-input placeholder="large size" nzSize="large">
<input nz-input placeholder="default size" nzSize="default">
<input nz-input placeholder="small size" nzSize="small">
inputPrePostCode:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'nz-demo-input-addon', template: `
` }) export class NzDemoInputAddonComponent { inputValue: string = 'my site'; }
inputGroupCode:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'nz-demo-input-group', template: `








` }) export class NzDemoInputGroupComponent { options = [{ value: 'zhejiang', label: 'Zhejiang', children: [{ value: 'hangzhou', label: 'Hangzhou', children: [{ value: 'xihu', label: 'West Lake', isLeaf: true }] }, { value: 'ningbo', label: 'Ningbo', isLeaf: true }] }, { value: 'jiangsu', label: 'Jiangsu', children: [{ value: 'nanjing', label: 'Nanjing', children: [{ value: 'zhonghuamen', label: 'Zhong Hua Men', isLeaf: true }] }] }]; }
inputAutoSizingCode:
<textarea nz-input placeholder="Autosize height based on content lines" nzAutosize></textarea>
<textarea nz-input placeholder="Autosize height with minimum and maximum number of lines" [nzAutosize]="{ minRows: 2, maxRows: 6 }"></textarea>
